synopsis.text: Weapon ized with the divine machinery, the last bastion of hope against the lethal virus 'Shinobi' that arrived on Earth via an asteroid, Princess Ame of the fallen Ise kingdom embarks on a perilous journey to salvage the remnants of humanity. With civilization in ruins and the remaining survivors seeking refuge in the underwater sanctuary of 'Kairiku,' the fate of the world rests in the hands of Ame and her unlikely ally, the formidable human weapon Suou. Together, they wield the legendary 'Giga-Road' in a desperate battle to counteract the apocalyptic effects of the virus and restore hope to a world on the brink of extinction.
